From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To configure the delay time to start the Pulse Code Modulation (PCM) trace capture, use the **monitor pcm-tracer delayed-start** command in global configuration mode. To disable the configuration, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: Delay, in seconds. The range is from 1 to 2147483.
